# startSession(configuration:)

**Instance Method**

Starts a new session and configures the processor pipeline.

## Declaration

```swift
func startSession(configuration: any VTFrameProcessorConfiguration) throws
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: A configuration object for the video effect that will be applied in the subsequent processing calls.

## Processing frames

- **process(parameters:completionHandler:)**: Asynchronously performs the video effect specified in the start session.
- **process(with:parameters:)**: Asynchronously performs the video effect specified in the start session specifically for Metal.
- **endSession()**: Performs all necessary tasks to end the session.
